title: Victor's emblem
body: Can anyone tell me what is the victor's emblem? it appeared in my hextech crafting as a "material" and i dont know what to do with it...

replies.body: That's a unique Hextech token that will be used to obtain a special icon once the VS Event ends. You'll be able to craft that emblem into the icon once the event is over, and the icon you get will be decided by who "wins" the event.

thx 4 answering him. i also was wondering about :)

I would like Yasuo to win, but he is symbolizing Chaos. Like bombs, panic, shootings.
I'm going with Riven because Order is overall a better option.

Chaos = true freedom, noone is controling your actions trough laws and regulations
Order = conrol trough any means necessary

there is no real winner: when chaos reigns noone will be safe, but everyone can do what they want, but when there is order you have no complete control over your life, someone will always be sperior and that isnt fair, but superiority must exist if order is to be successful.

Its a phylosophical question that can't be answered. Look at order as the Empire of the StarWars universe. In our society Order is an ideal, that we are tought in school as being = freedom, but in reality someone will always pull the strings.

Also, those bombs are thrown to achieve "peace" in that region, just like the Kosovo question in 1999. The radical islamists feel the opression, but are targeting inocents just because, idk. Humans are an aggresive species, we crave war, earlier generations experienced it and it was haunting to say the least. This generation has Shooter games and most of us play them, but we are viewed as weaker in comparison to our grandfathers and fathers. Its all a point of view.

So I don't do anything with it? It is just gonna turn into a icon at the end of the event?
When the event ends you'll be able to craft that Victor's Emblem into the winning icon. It doesn't turn into the icon on it's own, you have to craft it in your hextech loot!
so in other words, we earn the emblem... then have to craft it too. sounds great, wonder how many materials that'll take
That awkward moment when you lowkey diss riot and he responds *_*
I'm not **quite** 100% sure, but I don't think crafting the victor's emblem will require any materials at all! Once you earn it, you'll be able to craft the winner's icon at the end of the event.
